overview: In 1977, Gary Revel, was asked to investigate, the assassination of Martin Luther King Jr. He worked with Jack Kershaw and the House Select Committee on Assassination and meets with James Earl Ray. Danger, intrigue and murder follow.
tagline: In 1977, Gary Revel, was asked to investigate, the assassination of Martin Luther King Jr. He worked with Jack Kershaw and the House Select Committee on Assassination and meets with James Earl Ray. Danger, intrigue and murder follow.
title: MLK: The Gary Revel Story
